summary: A young man murders women, using a movie camera to film their dying expressions of terror.

Le Compte|Mme. Le Compte|Bartlett Mullins|Pete Murray|Margaret Neale|Columba Powell|Michael Powell|Guy Kingsley Poynter|Frankie Reidy|Alan Rolfe|Frank Singuineau|Peggy Thorpe-Bates|Susan Travers|Robert Vossler|Brian Wallace|Brian Worth
title: El fotógrafo del pánico
